main event: A witness observed a bright, flashing light in the sky over Cincinnati, Ohio on November 8, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about the size of a street lamp and was approximately 15-20 feet above the ground.
The object moved in a straight line from left to right for about 10 seconds before disappearing.
The witness described the object as a very bright light that was flashing on and off at approximately 1/2 second intervals.
The witness was certain of the time of the sighting, which occurred around 7:00 AM.
The witness initially thought the object might be a satellite, but the movement and flashing light pattern eliminated that possibility.
